channel.description: Recent content in Fulbright on Live Life D̶a̶n̶g̶e̶r̶o̶u̶s̶Curiously

item.title: My First US's Family Home Visit
item.description: Yesterday, (4th of August 2013) we went on home visit. We were lucky to have Sue as our host family. Sue’s house is quite far from St. John’s University since it is located in Ringwood, New Jersey. We took a bus from New York Port Authority Bus Terminal (PABT) to Ringwood. I really enjoy our trip since along the road I saw beautiful trees. Unfortunately, I don’t know what kind of trees was it.
